job.title: Frontend Developer
job.description: pShortList Recruitment are working with a Nationwide Real Estate company in the Austin area who are looking to bring in a Software Engineer to help their continued growth This developer would get the ability to enhance their current platform by adapting existing features and creating new ones to solve technical issues ppnbspppTasks pulliWork effectively with a team of 8 other BackendFrontend Developers and QAs to build an amazing software productliliBuild software primarily using ReactJS or AngularliliWork and communicate effectively in a team environmentliliThoughtful in code reviews with the ability to contribute and the desire to learnliulpbrppDesired Skills and Experience pulli5 years of software development experienceliliExperience with HTML5 CSS JavaScript and objectoriented programming languages liliExperience with ReactJS or AngularJS is required liliExperience with RESTful APIsliliExperience with Unit Testing is a plusliliExperience with Azure Cloud is a plus liulpnbspppThis position would be paying a Competitive Salary plus a fantastic benefits package The ideal candidate is located in Austin TXp
